self.name: inputFile
self.description: Defines a file saved in parts using the method upload.saveFilePart.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Defines a file saved in parts using the method upload.saveFilePart.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: Random file identifier created by the client

arguments.name: md5Checksum
arguments.description: In case the file's md5-hash was passed, contents of the file will be checked prior to use

parent.name: InputFile
parent.description: Defines a file uploaded by the client.
